turns.ai_line: Doctor, I dey feel serious pain for my belle after I chop the rice wey I keep yesterday. I dey even feel like to vomit and I don dey purge too. This sun too much here and food dey spoil quick.
turns.user_input: It depends when I go to sleep, but I don't like I want to help my sister.

turns.ai_line: Doctor, e be like say the rice don spoil before I chop am. How I go fit prevent this kind thing from happen again?
turns.user_input: I'm talking about the like giant form is double flags that you can fly

turns.ai_line: Doctor, I no go like make this kain thing happen again. E no good for body at all. Wetin you think say I fit do make I no chop bad food again?
turns.user_input: large antennas for receiving signals from outer space.
